mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `vanke`.`bus_guest` ( `guestname`, `sex`, `guestgrade`, `type`, `heartprice`, `phone`, `remarks`, `areas`, `huxing`, `position`, `purpose`, `label`, `iskey`, `record_user_name`, `create_user_name`, `create_time`, record_time, huxingshi, huxingting, huxingwei, huxingchu, record_rel_name, create_rel_name ) VALUES ( #{guestname}, #{sex}, #{guestgrade}, #{type}, #{heartprice}, #{phone}, #{remarks}, #{areas}, #{huxing}, #{position}, #{purpose}, #{label}, 0, #{recordUserName}, #{createUserName}, NOW(), NOW(), #{huxingshi}, #{huxingting}, #{huxingwei}, #{husingchu}, (SELECT relname FROM sys_user WHERE username=#{recordUserName}), (SELECT relname FROM sys_user WHERE username=#{createUserName}) )
mapper.update: UPDATE bus_guest SET record_time=NOW() WHERE id=#{id}
UPDATE bus_guest b SET b.record_user_name=#{recordUserName}, b.record_rel_name=(select su.relname from sys_user su where su.username=#{recordUserName}) WHERE bh.id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT (CASE WHEN (DATE(NOW())-DATE(record_time))>=10 AND (DATE(NOW())-DATE(record_time)) <15 THEN '1' WHEN (DATE(NOW())-DATE(record_time))>=15 THEN '2' END) casetype,id,record_user_name FROM `bus_guest` WHERE (DATE(NOW())-DATE(record_time))>=10 AND isshare = '0'
